The World’s Most (and Least) Powerful Passports in 2025

10 February 2025

Home
/
News and Articles
/
The World’s Most

Austria Citizenship by Investment

TAcquiring citizenship through the Austrian Citizenship Act grants you and your family lifelong full citizenship rights that can be inherited by future generations. Austria's citizenship allows for unrestricted living and working not only within the country but also throughout the European Union. The Austrian passport, known for its stellar reputation, provides extensive visa-free or visa-on-arrival access to various destinations such as Japan, Singapore, Hong Kong (SAR China), and the USA. It stands out as one of the world's top travel documents, ranking in the top 10 on the Henley Passport Index.

Requirements of Austria citizenship by investment

  • Visa-free or visa-on-arrival travel to approximately 190 destinations
  • The right to reside anywhere else in the EU and Switzerland
  • High quality of life
  • Excellent transport and communications

Austria citizenship by investment procedures 

To successfully secure citizenship through a capital investment, one must navigate through a series of complex procedures and obtain approval from multiple government entities. It is crucial for applicants to receive proper guidance from the outset, meticulously prepare each case, and secure informal endorsements from key ministries prior to initiating the investment and the official application process.

Kensington Group offers expert guidance on potential capital investment avenues, interfaces with diverse government bodies, and ultimately submits and files your application with the authorities.

Successful applicants receive full citizenship of the Republic of Austria by decision of the Government of Austria and can apply for a passport immediately afterwards. Passports are issued within a few days.

The grant of citizenship is not published and not reported to any other country, as it falls within the government provisions relating to privacy or official secrets.

Performance guarantee

The procedure involves a thorough background check.
